original_title: Dunith Wellalage to rejoin Sri Lanka squad ahead of Super 4 clash tomorrow
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) announced that all-rounder Dunith Wellalage will rejoin the squad in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) tomorrow (20), after attending the funeral of his late father.
Wellalage will be available for selection as Sri Lanka prepare to face Bangladesh in the  Super Four opener of the Asia Cup 2025, the SLC said.
